title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes (e.g., 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') are prominently displayed in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display obfuscated classes from JDK 1.4.
SR: Ensure that the Open Type dialog filters out obfuscated classes from JDK 1.4 and displays only relevant and non-obfuscated classes.
